scripts.dev: npm run clean:ports && concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run start:dev -w backend/api"
scripts.clean:ports: powershell -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000, 5173 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.State -eq 'Listen' } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; exit 0"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend/api && npm run build -w frontend
